etymology.value: Origin unknown. Possibly related to 'nip' (a small drink of spirits).

usage_notes.explanation: This word is very rare and archaic. It is unlikely to be encountered in modern English.

readability_explanation.text: This word is highly obscure and not in common usage. It would only be found in very old texts.
